p: As mentioned previously, the interest in using EOs against various diseases has increased, mainly because oil composition can be correctly and deeply analyzed; thus, one can certainly appreciate the effect generated by these compounds after application. Their use was also made for neglected diseases caused by various classes of pathogens, including protozoa, viruses, bacteria, and helminths, and for which the interest of pharmaceutical companies in healing was, in some cases, non-existent, as presented in the review by Luna [ 52].
